pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-4908] Enable run/debug single when the suitable task is provided by the Gradle project.
pullRequest.bodyText: Well it is a bit more than I thought at first. At the start I would have checked only the existence of runSingle task, though if I remember someone would have liked run task defined for certain executable class in his project. With this pr run.single action can be redefined to use a run${selectedClassName} task.

commit.message: [NETBEANS-4908] Enable run/debug single if Gradle task are provided

nodes.bodyText: Consider adding better Javadoc. Description/example of "where/how to register this interface" was something I'd have expected here.

commit.message: [NETBEANS-4908] made Gradle Actions resolvable for modules.
